Like most of the competition, there are always a few software issues that are not included that make opening some sites difficult.  I was not able to use Sirius radio but was able to use Pandora.  Some sites have graphics displays imbedded and some did not load.All in all, I would buy another and recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Is Android for Tablets Ready For Prime Time?
Reviews.Author: sam02135
Reviews.Content: Well, I bought this 32GB version of the Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 as a Christmas gift for myself and having been waiting to own a tablet I so so so wanted for almost a year now as I've "tested" many tablets this past year so that I can make the right decision in owning the right tablet for myself.  I'm commented on the Asus Transformer Prime, Tab, Tab 2, etc.  Well, I was quite disappointed with all of them, even this Note 10.1.  I had some issues where I was going to return this item soon.  THEN ... notification that the Note 10.1 has a software update to Jelly Bean 4.1x.  I've only had this software update less then a week and I'm enjoying this tablet a lot more.  Autocorrection of text is not overbearing anymore.  Moving the virtual keypad is a lot easier instead of two finger swipes that may or may not accomplish the desired task.  Entering text, sometimes with the former version of Android had the cursor on top of the character which was crazy.  My tablet with the again former version of Android for some reason turned of (standby) the tablet.  I know when I would hit the off button or when it times out, but not within 3 to 5 seconds of using the stylus pen.  Though this tablet is a little heavy, I would still prefer a lighter tablet.  I'm really looking into the Note 8 that's suppose to be announced next week and I would give that a try.  I believe with Jellybean 4.1x that Android has probably stablized though I will continue to monitor the "turning off"  thing.  But what if the "turning off" thing still occurs after the return policy with Christmas gifts has expired?  I've seen this issue with the Asus.. and they addressed it with a software upgrade.  Things I wish for: Mini HDMI port, USB port.  What also makes a difference is a leather case for this device.  I actually can't wait  for the Note 8.  I hope this helps anyone making a decision.  I've also tried the Nexus, but the only front facing camera doesn't give options that I would like.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Boyfriend bought one for me for Xmas and I absolutely love it. With the newest update to Jelly Bean, I am able to open different apps cascade mode (just like how you can do it on Windows OS, windows overlapping and running in the background). Granted it can be used with limited apps for the time being, but so far it has proven to be the best multi-tasking and productive tablet out there.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before I settled with this one.  I considered Goggle Nexus and ASUS Transformer also. The key difference is the Quad-core CPU, a stylus, external SD card and they ability to use additional devices through a dongle (like HDMI display output and external storage). I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: If you don't like Apple products...
Reviews.Author: Pop-Ernie "Ernie"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Tablet is the closest competition I have found to Apple.  Android is a winner in my book!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: Takes a little to learn system but then great!!Love it! Great portability!Much nicer than using laptop & so much easier to carry.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: MaryN "KindleLover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a holiday gift for my spouse and so far (a month later) it is a big hit.  The onscreen keyboard is easy to use.  The size of the tablet makes displays perfect.  We purchased a Bluetooth keyboard case to accompany the tablet which works well.  Our grandson used this tablet to stream a television show seamlessly while he was visiting last week.  A friend has had this tablet for several months and recommended it because he felt it is the best android tablet available.  So far I agree.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note  10.1 32GB
Reviews.Author: THOMAS
Reviews.Content: BY FAR, THE BEST TABLET I HAVE EVER OWNED. I DON'T THINK I'M EVER GOING TO TURN MY COMPUTER ON AGAIN. IF YOU HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY, GET ONE OF THESE. ITS WORTH EVERY DIME, LOVE IT  :-)

Reviews.Title: Amazing and innovative product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This android tablet is a real value for the money.  The Samsung features along with the android os really add to productivity and creativity.  The s-pen and multiple screen apps are fantastic.  The processing speed and other functionality are outstanding.  Apparently the resolution complaints do not take the wacom digitalizer into consideration.  I would reccomend this tablet to everyone who wants something more from a top notch android machine.  So glad I decided to purchase this extremely high quality product from Amazon.After using this tablet for over 3 months, I am quite pleased with it's artistic capabilities.  So much fun to draw and paint with it.  Simply amazing!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kay H.
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for my bf who is an engineering major in college, and he absolutely loves the note and all the apps that are specifically for the s pen. He loves that he can use the tablet to multi task. The tablet is light weight and feels sturdy, and the display is great. Love the fact that additional memory is only a micro sd card away. Just get this tablet a good case and its set. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I am a bit biased since I love my Note phone (despite the fact that I replaced it with the Galaxy SIII), but I absolutely love my Note 10.1.  I am a crafty type and a technology type as well.  The combination of being able to utilize technology and creativity makes this a winning product in my book.The stylus technology of the Note family of products a real stand out for anyone who wants to be able to be creative with their devices!  You won't find this level of accuracy in any other tablet currently on the market.  If you are fed up with using the annoying rubber nub stylus, look no further.  This device has a stylus that has a precision tip that doesn't feel like you are using a crayon to write on your screen!Additionally, the processing power of this device won't leave you wishing for more.  You will be scribbling and browsing and whatever else you do with your tablet with ease!I highly recommend this device!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mazen Kaedbey
Reviews.Content: Love itGoodbye iPad it was nice knowing you.Cons:Slow chargingCharging port location is a bit offPros:It's an AndroidGreat Sound with the front facing speakersGreat design

Reviews.Title: One awesome tablet!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Satisfieddiva
Reviews.Content: I read some reviews and still chose to go with it and I'm glad I did. I love Samsung products and even though applications can't be stored on the sd card it still is a rockin tablet. It was easy to download keyboards to it. What it didn't come with I added it. I have only owned it for less than a week and I'm loving it. I will use this to the fullest extent that I can. Sorry to the ones that didn't have my experience with it. The updates downloaded flawlessly and I was also able to download my calendar and contacts from my galaxy note phone easily to my tablet with the help of Kies!  I showed a co-worker and she cancelled her ipad 4 order and went with this one. The versatility with android tablets is worth every penny to me. Add more memory check, put what ever you want on it without another application check. Needing to sync to get updates not! Updates done without another application check, well with my phone I did need Kies and that was somewhat easy. I'm one satisfied customer. One downside is learning as you go. No manual to show you everything, like tips of holding down the home key to get a cool window of your tasks and RAM manager.  For the price you can't beat it. Absolutely an awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: C Doe
Reviews.Content: Item, is exactly as described, great value and quality.  This is one of the best products in this market. It is user friendly and simple but can be personalised and customised to do many very cleaver and complicated things.  It is alsoexcellent at syncing with other devices which is something that many other tablets struggle with.Very ImpressedIt was also processed and delivered quickly.Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Samsung tablet
Reviews.Author: Shelby
Reviews.Content: It's awesome, beats the iPad... Has so much more you can do!Get it, it will be worth it. The screen is clearer and my son loves choosing books with it.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Ji "VT Hokies"
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet out there.There are so many great things about the Galaxy Note as other have said.I want to emphasize the great feature of multi-task ability and nifty S-pen.

Reviews.Title: Same price as Brandsmart
Reviews.Author: Nadia
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 already at the place mentioned above and both the quality and the price are the same. This one had the added convenience of shipping it to be rather than me having go out and find a store. Would recommend the purchase. Delivery was before time too.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Shijith Sreedharan "Shiji"
Reviews.Content: Excellent notepad..lot of features..I love it! Fast shipping and Good product. This is exactly what I wanted for buy in a notepad

Reviews.Title: I am Very Happy with This Tablet
Reviews.Author: Peggy McPhillips
Reviews.Content: Never owed a smart phone and this is my first tablet.  It is very easy to use.  Apps are simple to download, I was able to download Cloud Print so I can now print from the device.  Haven't used the note taking so can't comment on that.  So far I am very happy with the Samsung Galaxy Note 10

Reviews.Title: TEACHERS WILL WANT THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: Chase
Reviews.Content: I am a Education Asst. I do alot of note takeing and this makes it easier to write notes and i can print them off with no promblem. I can take Pics of Worksheets fill the answers and print that Pic off. I am in the process of getting the over head projector to work. GREAT PRODUCT BLOWS APPLE OUT OF THE WATER!!

Reviews.Title: I'm in Love
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey D Floyd
Reviews.Content: I had bought the new 64gb ipad , but took it gack for this , also bought a 32gb sd card also , music , movies ,and books ,plus alot of games , bring on my vacation . You wont ge disappointed

Reviews.Title: Perfect power, great value for a quad core
Reviews.Author: K Lee
Reviews.Content: What is there to say?  It's a Samsung Tablet that does wonders.  Although it would be probably helpful for an experienced user to root it so that you can get a better control on some of the software or at least try and split some of the program memory onto the external SD card, at 16GB, it's plenty of room for any user.  The screen and build quality is above par and it sure beats carrying a laptop unless you are doing some serious work.  Compared to others, the only other rival tablet in my opinion would be the Asus Infinity (TF700 series) with their slightly faster quad core.  Overall, I like the build on this.  My wife has the older Tab 10.1, so I was a little bias to continue using their propriatary connector-to-usb cord.  I'm not sure why Samsung didn't bother with using a micro-usb baffles me, but so far, the connector is solid and it doesnt pop out as easily as micro usb.

Reviews.Title: convenient
Reviews.Author: Kathy Merris
Reviews.Content: This will be handy when traveling.  Much lighter and smaller than a laptop and does most of what I need.  Larger screen for reading, magazine viewing and pictures than a Nook.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for students.
Reviews.Author: DJ Nfinity
Reviews.Content: As an engineering student, I needed a tablet that I could actually write with (beyond the terrible excuse for a stylus that is sold at brick and mortar stores that works on any tablet. This tablet excels in all areas I need a tablet to. Speed, functionality, and longitude (fantastic battery). For this price, there is simply no comparison.

Reviews.Title: Totally Happy!
Reviews.Author: CGalvis
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 is the best tablet there is!!! I has met my expectations and beyond, totally recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Eddy Martinez "Eddyx"
Reviews.Content: There are enough reviews dealing with specs and benchmarks, I will only offer my opinion having  owned other tablets. This tablet it amazing, it is fast and can really multitask.  The Stylus is the key, it is accurate and smooth. Writing with the stylus is like writing with a pen, there is so much potential for software developers with this device.  The S apps are user friendly, multiscreen is a very nice feature as well as the floating apps. I have used the photoshop app that is preinstalled, it is similar to the photoshop for PC/MAC just not as robust, having this top level tool on a tablet really takes it to the next level of functionality.  The line between tablet and laptop is narrowing with the Galaxy Note. Between the unique software and powerful processor the other players in the market are going to have to step up their game.

Reviews.Title: long learning curve on pen...but can get good results
Reviews.Author: john Lampe
Reviews.Content: I'm a want to be artist and reluctant construction guy of homes (enjoy the design and build, not the clients). Been waiting for a tablet to come out that has real artist/designer sensitive drawing capacity. This tablet does, but the drawing pen has so many variable to learn to use I recommend putting aside at least 7 - 10 hours to really learn all it does. You can get very good results with pen. For first 3 days I was disappointing with pen results until I learn to push as hard as I would with a mechanical pencil using a #2 HB lead. Harder than you think you should. After that I got the graduated scales of grey and ability to gain depth of pen stroke that I was hoping to get out of a touch sensitive pen vs the regular tablet interface. Overall, if I work it, I can get very good drawings out of tablet....near artist quality like pen and ink or pencil grey scale. You will not be producing large scale on art on this small tablet screen, but for the doodler/artist it's good enough.Have not used the Photoshop feature much, so will not comment on photo editing. As I stated above, I was most interested in tablet for drawing capacity.As to using the pen as part of the software to annotate photos to attach to email etc.., it's easy to use. Not as much software out yet that takes advantage of drawing capacity, but device comes with enough software to do anything you would want to do. Results are equivalent to a sharpie marker.I find that I would rather type notes than use pen. So for me the pen is not that big of a deal for normal everyday operations.Rest of tablet features are like any Android. Plays back movies better than most and speakers front facing are better than the side ones I had on my Samsung Galaxy 7.0 Plus or the back ones on my Ipad 2 (which the carrying case covers).Quality of screen resolution is really really nice.I don't know why some reviews talk about flimsy build. Seem very sturdy to me. More than most tablets. Battery life is great.I would buy again.UPDATE 11-7-2012...............GREAT ABILITY TO CORRECT DRAWINGS........ Three things about using tablet for sketching ...1> I use the split screen function of tablet and have photo on one side and draw on other side.Small space but OK as can enlarge specific sections.2> Drawing on glass is strange. No grab like paper does to pen or pencil. I miss that feel.3> With real paper and pen or ink, it's hard to erase and if you work sketch much the paper becomes torn or smudged. WITH TABLET THE ERASING IS SIMPLE AND COMPLETE. I MEAN REALLY COMPLETE. I have produced better finished sketches because of this feature. A lot better. I can go and clean up all the over drawn lines with the erase feature and it erases at the same fine detail that pen draws at. Completely adjustable.  Making the pen and ink drawings flawless. The "undo" feature is also great for cleaning up drawing.All I can say is that drawing on tablet is different. I would never have considered that the ease of erasing and correcting would be such a great feature.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: zeeadarling
Reviews.Content: About me: I'm a 22 year old female. I'm an artist and I work 2 jobs where I am on the go a lot.  The note is a big help because I have nice little piece of technology to store ideas & checklists and check important emails with. I have had this tablet for about 4 weeks now.I bought this tablet because I was looking for a digital graphics tablet that was portable.  Originally I was seeing only tablets that were specifically for drawing and worked in addition to a computer. I wanted something thin, portable and easy to use.Main things I like and use it for:-Drawing out ideas with the pen and saving them to different folders to organize-Writing To Do Lists and ideas in my own hand writing. I like having them all in one place and not having to carry around folders and sketch books that will eventually fray and have pages fall out.-Surfing the internet away from home.- Checking balances and paying bills.-It has a nice map & navigation feature but I don't think either can work without internet connection, which is a downfall because if you're on the road and don't have it then it's useless.-I like planning with my calendar that comes with it, but I may try to find a different calendar app that let's me write with the pen and put little pictures on it to spruce it up.-Taking webcam pics daily and using the back camera to take pictures of my home cooked meals or quick snaps of things I made.-Reading. It comes with Nook. But what I am disappointed about with that is that it doesn't have every book that I want to read! You would think they would have everything. Kindle has a lending library that I wish Nook had something similar so I could check that out.A note about surfing the internet- It has a mobile view that has the more simplistic layout of websites for faster surfing, but you can also switch to desktop view to see the page in full like on a regular computer which is a great feature!So far it has served its purpose with very few glitches.  Lately I have been experiencing a glitch where the internet won't close out when I hit the x. Hopefully that will go away, it's not that big of an issue.The biggest issue I realized with it, is that flash is not supported on it.  This means that if there are games you want to play on a website or anything that supports flash and even videos you try to watch (not through the youtube app), you will be unable to see it.  The Note does come with a youtube & Netflix app so you can watch anything through it.  I would like for this device to support the Direct tv for mobile devices so I can watch normal programs through it too. That would be perfect!I really hope that in the future there will be drawing apps specifically for this tablet.  I have drawn a few things now with it on Snote [which is really just for ideas and sketches] and I am adjusting to its features.  What I am really hoping for is maybe a Photoshop type of app that you can do different layers with your artwork and add on masks and filters etc.  The ideal app would have what I just mentioned plus an array of brushes and tools where you can adjust pressure/lightness, smudge, sharpen and lighten/darken tools, and the feature where only your pen reacts to it. Because it's an issue when you're trying to draw but it's also registering your hand at the same time and the page will try to scroll or zoom.So far this has worked really great for my needs and I hope that there will be some advances that I can benefit from in the future. I want this product to take artwork a little more seriously and be able to run apps that have in depth drawing features.The Note becomes really comfortable and easy to use once you have a case for it.  It's very portable and just looks nice and I enjoy using it now that I have it customized.One other thing: I wish they had a longer than 1 year warranty that you don't have to pay for.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet out there
Reviews.Author: goodspeech
Reviews.Content: This is hands down the best tablet out there.  I am an educational administrator and have to attend lots of meetings where I have to take lots of notes, review lots of documents and track lots of data.  The handwriting on this tablet is outstanding!!!!!  The ability to move between apps, documents and websites with the task manager keeps productivity at a max.  With the introduction of the split screen display, Samsung has raised the bar for all other tablets to follow.  It works seamlessly with websites, documents, handwriting apps, etc. I have used other tablets for several years and have waited for this one to hit the market.  Way to go Samsung!!!!!!Cons: need to be able to print to other printers besides Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: J Kim
Reviews.Content: Almost perfect with few possible things to enhance.1. No NFC2. Some Samsung recommended apps are not working (or links were dead).3. Samsung services require too many registrations and log ins.4. Although this device is Wi-fi only, isn't it possible to preload maps and enable it to be a navigator?*** UPDATEAfter I used this device for one week, I learned that my point #4 is no problem. You can use several "offline" navigation software which doesn't require realtime map downloading.BTW, the more I play with S pen, the more I love this device.If you get this device, don't forget to read S-pen instruction on a mini manual's "using the S pen" section. Further, when you type something, you should click set up for experiencing realtime input with your own handwriting on anywhere such as web browser address section, word processing software, etc. Also, find some info on S-memo usage. You can do a lot of things using the software in combination with S-pen.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy note tablet, limited comparison
Reviews.Author: Jim H
Reviews.Content: I am somewhat new to tablets and android, I compare ipad 3's success in making up my mind.  Apple does a heck of a good job but I am usually an alternative shopper.  I bought the Note after a lot of comparing and some experience with android, I chose android for the common reason of apple users complaint of no internal storage options in the ipad, speaker location (volune and non-stereo), and apples pricing structures.  The Android system is sufficient in their software for my needs and I do like the idea of an open application market.  Now for the Samsung note tablet, I did not want to buy a prodect that was inferior to the new ipad and the price comparisons are both a bit pricey however that is what the market is, the Note is in line for price when compared to other products of this power and features (I looked hard at this).  I have had the Note for three weeks, the installed software meet my needs (impressed with the pri-installed word processer) and added some free apps, the screens are nice and easy to  personalise and make me feel at home, I don't seem to notice the lower resolution (1200 x 800 I think?) other people comment on although you can tell a slight difference if you compare very close but the color and smoothness of the overall display seem to negate the difference.  I have the 32gb version and am glad I went that way although I don't know that the 16gb model would be much of a problem because the 32gb micro sd card I have installed works flawlessly.  "Overall" I see no down side with this unit (wifi only), its quick, I like the processor and 2gb on board processer setup which is probably why its so quick.  Battery life is what they say it is, the 10.1" screen makes it bulky compared to a 7" (I also have a 7" kindle fire) but the extra bulk soon makes up for its size in ease of use along with easy on the eye.  I like having a 7" and 10" option but the premium experience is the 10" Note.  The Note does not hang up or act wierd, the good sound and speaker position is the plus they say it is, the kindle fire HD has a bit better sound and volume but the Note is a reasonable second and a no contest in head to head features of the note.  I agree with the more common view that the kindle fire is very good a streaming media experience but its use stops there, if you want to do much more than that the Note has gobs of more potential.  I like my old Kindle Fire and Fire HD, what would I do if stuck with only one? Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Table is my recomendation and I havn't even explored the "pen" features.  I play a lot of media on the Note, it does a great job and when I want to do more its all right in my hands.  One more comment "on board storage" the note really has it (up to 64gb mini sd card and you can swap cards), I don't like my tablet telling me its out of space.

Reviews.Title: I never write reviews but
Reviews.Author: amaldonado
Reviews.Content: 1. Hardware: many people complain about the built quality of this tablet, I don't find anything wrong with it, I think its a good plastic (it doesn't bend unless you push it hard) and once you have it, you don't even notice it.2. Software: I also own a transformer prime and the iPad 3 ( I gave the iPad to my nephew after I bought the note 10.1). The transformer crashes all the time even with the official jelly bean. This tablet is the best I've ever had, it's very smooth, not laggy at all and most important apps and browser don't crash. I hope I will get the same features as the galaxy note 2 when it gets jelly bean ( If you don't know what I'm taking about check out some YouTube videos and you will see the awesomeness of the note 2).3. The S pen: To me it feels better than writing on a piece of paper, its very responsive with more than 1,024 levels of pressure sensitivity. I'm a college student so I use it in the classroom all the time, I only buy e-books so I dont have to carry around heavy textbooks, ebooks are  by far cheaper than textbooks. Also I can take notes directly on my ebooks and only see them when I need them. With the s pen app I can easily solve math problem just by writing the ecuation under the formula category of the app and I gives me the answer step by step and the graph if possible.This are reviews from people that own the tablet, if you are looking for the best android tablet in the market, this is one of the best options,  believe you won't regret.

Reviews.Title: Wow, it can do that?
Reviews.Author: Aarion
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough good things about this tablet.  Great screen quality and color.  Lot's of functionality.  If you are already using a Galaxy Tab but have use for a stylus/handwriting note taker then this is the tablet for you.  I use it for school and now I use it for everything.  The S Note app which comes with the tablet does have a slightly steep learning curve, but if you enjoy that then it is definitely worth the time and the tablet.Recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Deusdies
Reviews.Content: I thought I should "settle" for this thing temporarily because I did not really like the specs (especially the screen resolution). I was waiting for my Transformer Infinity to arrive (which has a Full HD screen), so I thought I would use this in the meantime and return it once I get the Infinity. Worth noting also is that I was an owner of the new iPad.To sum up my review ahead: 20 days after my infinity arrived, the results are in: I kept the Note 10.1 and returned the infinity.Granted, the Infinity has a higher resolution screen (as does iPad 3) so it makes everything look sharp, but it loses on every other front. Persistent lag issues, quality control problems (I actually exchanged the Infinity 3 times before finally getting one that was "okay"), lag again, light bleeding, etc.The Note has absolutely no hardware problems. The S Pen is fantastic. The interface is the only OEM android skin that I actually like. The tablet is smooth and beautiful - I have come to prefer plastic over metal (both have its (dis)advantages though). The sounds on this thing is fantastic too. S Planner, S Note, a plethora of other apps that come with make the tablet experience full. Multiscreen? Heck yes! This is one of the reasons I sold my iPad - it was too limiting, couldn't really do much of productive work with it.This device would be the dream comes true if only it had a Full HD screen. But I am confident Samsung will come up with one soon.

Reviews.Title: everything I expected it to be
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Williams
Reviews.Content: My son surprised me with a Galaxy Tab 2 10.1, but since I've had my eye on the Note 10.1 I went ahead and exchanged it for this one.It was well worth the wait. I can't understand why there are so many Apple devotees when Samsung offers a stellar product. I dipped toes in with their phones and televisions, and now I own an entire complement of their electronics, with a laptop and this tablet being my most recent purchases.It's lightweight, has the incredible display/graphics that Samsung is known for, and I got my first three days of moderate use out of it before the battery even began to look like it was dipping.I would prefer the body be titanium or aluminum rather than plastic, but even at that it's still not a bad-looking little number.I'm still playing around and poking at features, but I'm pretty thrilled so far. I'll update with any cons (or stellar pros) should I discover any.

Reviews.Title: This is Great.
Reviews.Author: MichaelC
Reviews.Content: I love this product... It definitely beats out ipad in function..i have many tattoo artist friends that love using the sketch pad for example and love it.... ITs fast .... its cool its better than apple...

Reviews.Title: Printing issues
Reviews.Author: rbchappell
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, however I feel Samsung was deceptive in that there was NO mention of it's provided App's only printing to Samsung printers. Had I known that up front, I may not have made the purchase.I have tried third party App's attempting to get around the problem with little success. I wonder if there are any plans to relieve this problem.

Reviews.Title: Very nice performance, disappointed by the lack of ports
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I'll not repeat what many other positive reviews have said. I will, however, note that the utter lack of external ports is disappointing. Less costly tablets have USB or HDMI ports for interfacing with projectors, TVs, and such. I think this device is really hamstrung by requiring expensive, proprietary hardware in order to interact with another device.That much said, it's filled its purpose as a learning device for our 4-year-old pretty well, since the Android marketplace has a wealth of educational games.UPDATE: I've come to hate the proprietary plug that powers this tablet. Our 4-year-old watches videos on this and, with the case we have, it's not possible to stand the tablet up for watching while it's plugged in. The cable gets mashed on the bottom of the tablet. I love having tablets and intend to pick up another Android tablet sometime this year. But unless Samsung starts making more pragmatic devices, I'm going to look somewhere else.In short - minus one star for only one port. Minus another for that port being for a proprietary power plug. Otherwise it's an excellent Android device.

Reviews.Title: This has to the best product I bought for 2012!!!
Reviews.Author: Sahadeo Kangal
Reviews.Content: This came in well packaged! What I loved about this was the UBS and SD connection kit that I bought separately, came packaged together with the tablet. At first I tried buying the tablet on Samsung website but it was sold out. So this was my this was last hope. I crossed my fingers and hoped that it was good and no problems. And finally when i opened it, it was perfect. Came sealed and in the box. Brand new with no problems at all! It works amazing and smooth...absolutely LOVE IT! I carry it every where.  Has a 10.1" screen which makes it easy to see and watch videos or movie. I tell everyone to buy this!

Reviews.Title: Love the note!
Reviews.Author: Deborah peters
Reviews.Content: The note does everything I want it to.  The picture and video quality are even better than expected.  I haven't touched my desktop since I received it!  I wish it had 4G capabilities but iu either get wi-fi or 4G and I had to pick.  This tablet was the best rated and it has lived up to its rating.  I also started Skype-ing send again, the audio/visual are top notch! I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Very glad i bought it.
Reviews.Author: Frank Lee
Reviews.Content: really great for reading my books and comics. even found some great apps to tutor my kids on it.i'm especially fond of the speakers. good for  watching movies and listening to music.i'm really glad it came complete and without any flaws.because i did read the reviews that some of them came incomplete or had some flaws.but i really wanted one and it came alright.

Reviews.Title: The  best tablet of the market
Reviews.Author: Arturo
Reviews.Content: Could not get a better product !!!  The best tablet to work on it and not just watch videos or  check your social network status. If you really want to have a product to use it as profesional then get this one is great !!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Hugo Lopez Acosta
Reviews.Content: I'm very glad I bought this tablet.  Although, there are two points maybe could be better. 1. The screen is good, but with sunlight is hard to see. 2. There are not  exclusives apps for android tablets, like apple have for the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Innovative Tablet
Reviews.Author: subyfly
Reviews.Content: I'm going to keep this short because there's a lot in here have praised it properly. One thing is that I love the multi-tasking capability as this was was one of the few things I've kept away from tablets all this time. Being an IT Manager, I'm a power user and I've tried 3 different tablets including an iPad. Out of those tablets I've used in the past, the iPad came close to being my main device to manage an infrastructure when I'm away but still wasn't a true "multi-tasking" device.And then I saw this device and heard and seen the capabilities and I can see myself connected to my email and having my browser up and running on the other end and managing my servers through the browser. Now I didn't get the Note 10.1 from Amazon but through my Vendor but thought I would share my experience anyways.One thing that was a flaw from the moment I opened and turned it on is that my screen had a pretty decent size of a cluster of dead pixels. So I'll be exchanging it immediately. I did think about getting the Asus Infinity TF700 but was hearing LOTS of flaws and Quality of the design.  So hopefully my Note is just a small flaw and a replacement isn't going to have the same problem, otherwise the device is very speedy and with 2GB of Ram, should be some sort of future proof.I would definitely consider and recommend this product to anyone who are multi-task. I still have my new iPad but have forgotten and have not turned it on since. It now belongs to my wife. However, I use my Macbook Air 2012 and ThinkPad x220 for my daily use.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tim's girl
Reviews.Content: This is a great Tablet... The size of the screen is perfect! and it has quite a bit o memory. The only downsides are, no USB port No HDMI port, and it doesn't support the amazon prime app.Also I bought the USB adapter cord and it doesn't recognize the USB...

Reviews.Title: Bellísima!!! Súper Tecnología
Reviews.Author: Janeth
Reviews.Content: Gorgeous! super TechnologyExcelente!!! Gracias Amazon, todas las veces que he realizado compras, responden por la mercancía vendida. Todo llega en perfecto estado y si se da el caso de algún improvisto ellos responden.Respecto a la tableta es de excelente calidad, una maravilla, tecnología de primera. La recomiendo 100%. Compren con seguridad.Excellent! Thanks Amazon, all the times I've made ​​purchases, account for goods sold. Everything comes in perfect condition and if for some unexpectedly given them respond.Regarding the tablet is of excellent quality, wonderful, technology first. I recommend it 100%. Buy with ease.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for the Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Helen
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately my Galaxy Tab 2 was not waterproof. I was not able to salvage it after I spilled water on it (yes, I tried the rice trick)I had the Galaxy Tab for almost 3 years and if I wouldn't have ruined it, I wouldn't be replacing it. If you are thinking of purchasing the Tab over the Note, it's a good option and less $$. However, even though I was mostly happy with the Tab 2, I decided to purchase the Note 10.1 this time around mainly for the quad-core processor. The s-pen is a neat feature but not a selling point and to date I haven't used it much more than to play around with it. I do a lot of photography with my DSLR camera and like to be able to store many pictures on my tablet. I do not use the tablet for picture taking. The quality is ok if all you plan on doing with your photos is posting on social media.I've read reviews where some say the resolution isn't as clear as other tablets. The Note 10.1 and the Tab 2 have the same resolution and it is very crisp and clear. I have no complaints. I almost bought the 2014 edition of the Note 10.1 solely for the fact that it claims to have a crisper resolution. However, I opted to save a few $$ and I have no complaints. I have to note, that I purchased this tablet without having seen it first and when I was comparing the 2014 version, I didn't see that either. So, I can't say if there's a noticeable difference in the 2 screens.The tablet is fast, resolution is great and does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: My precious baby ♥
Reviews.Author: D.A. Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This was almost everything I was hoping for! It works like a breeze, is quicker than any of my computers, smooth, GORGEOUS graphics, and I love the S-pen. I use this tablet to read books, work on stories, draw, take notes, make lists, document travel, and watch short videos, and it works well for everything I need. Great to take when traveling or finishing up a few quick things before bed!Downsides:- PS Touch is... weird? When I use the S-Pen on PS Touch my lines come out weirdly pixellated. I don't have this problem on any of the other art apps I installed. Sticking to Sketchbook, I think.- I can't copy large chunks of text from Polaris to other word processors, which is irritating when I'm writing.- The autocorrect doesn't... well, autocorrect. It offers a likely alternative, but you have to actually hit it to make it fix your typos, which really slows down writing.

Reviews.Title: poor battery
Reviews.Author: easydoesit
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great, other than taking 12 hours or more to charge the battery each time. Samsung has a problem and needs to step up to the plate and fix it. I don't use many apps, and don't leave things running. There is no reason for it to take so long to charge, especially when I turn it off to charge. Without the charging problem, I would give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: WIFI stopped working from time to time
Reviews.Author: Tom Liu
Reviews.Content: The WIFI stopped working from time to time, and the only way to resolve the WIFI connection issue is to do a factory reset, which will remove all data on the tablet. I had the tablet for about two weeks, and had to do factory reset three times.I liked the tablet and wanted to keep it, but it's just too much time to spend on fixing the WIFI connection issue, and i am not able to afford the time anymore. Unfortunately i had to return the tablet, which cost me more than two hours (packing the product, drove to UPS and dropped off the box).

Reviews.Title: Amazing tablet
Reviews.Author: asmaa makhoukhi
Reviews.Content: I had the Galaxy 2 10.1 tablet and then I upgraded to the note 10.1 and by far this is the best tablet you can own, amazing speed, amazing screen resolution, light weight and good size. This is the best tablet.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great for students
Reviews.Author: Colt
Reviews.Content: Got this for Christmas last year and a year later it still rocks! I use it for notes all the time in school. If you are in class a lot I would recommend. It is light and quick to look things up. Notes are easy to take and the handwriting feature is a bonus and it looks close to my real writing style. It takes some getting used to for sure.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous tablet.
Reviews.Author: J. R. Luciano "Librery Cat"
Reviews.Content: Fabulous tablet. Yes, this is one of my best adquisitions in Amazon.com. This tablet makes almost everything you can desire in this kind of electronic tool. It's potent, quick, has beautiful screen, very good sound and a large amount of apps pre-installed. Besides you have the play-store and Samsung store with a lot of apps every day.

Reviews.Title: I like it but...
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet as a gift for my birthday. Im pleased with it for the most part but there are things that really irritate me about this tablet. Here they are:1. The microphone for the tablet is located at the bottom where the charging port is. Very annoying. When I skype with friends and family they tell me that my voice sounds "muffled". The only way they can hear me clearly is if I hold the tablet, which brings me to my next problem.2. I bought a little case for the tablet which props it up so I dont have to hold it. I really love the case but when the tablet sits up right the microphone is covered. When it lays flat no one can see me. When I turn it sideways so it is in portrait mode the person in which I am skyping cuts in half. I dont know if that is a tablet thing or a skype app thing but the tablet doesnt adjust to the change. When it is upside down (camera at the bottom, microphone at the top) it works but then whoever im skyping with is practically looking up my nose. I dont like it.3. The battery runs down even when Im not using it. When I had my ipad I could turn it off and leave it for a couple of days and the battery would barely go down. This tablet acts more like a computer (I have to shut it down every night or when I'm not using it)4. The tablet comes preloaded with roughly 1GB of apps I DONT WANT!! There is no way to delete them unless you "root" your tablet (I looked on YouTube for how to do it and it's a process. Not to mention the damage that could be caused if a mistake is made)5. I specifically wanted this tablet because I thought it would be very useful for school (I'm a junior in college). I really like taking notes my tablet but I'm irritated by the lack of printing options. There aren't any! When I tried to print my boarding pass it gave me an error saying "Can only print using a Samsung Printer". Seriously??? This tablet brand new costs almost as much as a new ipad and I'm restricted to only using a Samsung printer? I'm very unhappy about that.6. When watching a review about the tablet I saw that you can hand gesture and the keyboard splits in half. I can't get mine to do it. I have tried over and over. It just doesn't work for me.In the long run I like the tablet. I'm not a very picky person and I can look past these defects since it was a gift. I would have definitely given it 5 stars if it werent for those tablet manufacturing errors. I personally wouldnt drop $400+ of my own money on it but since it was a gift Im okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Great value after price drops.
Reviews.Author: Techno geek
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance for the price now that it's old enough for discounts.  The S-Pen is surprisingly useful for Ebook annotation and scrolling.  Battery life is exceptional.Paired it with a bluetooth keyboard and it worked flawlessly.  I just wish it used a standard min-usb plug like other tablets.

Reviews.Title: Minor complaints; overall GREAT tablet
Reviews.Author: Robyn Allegra "I love to read but sometimes h...
Reviews.Content: This tablet is magnificent! The stylus works very well. You definitely want to get a cover to protect it though. My only complaints are that 1) there is no USB drive (but of course it's too thin to have one) and 2) it can only print to Samsung printers.Thankfully there are ways to get around both of these: 1) You can purchase an adapter (like the OEM Samsung 30-Pin to USB Adapter for Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 / 10.v / 8.9) which will allow you to use USB-powered devices and 2) The Samsung people told me that you can download apps in the Play Store for your printer. I have downloaded an HP app but haven't had a chance to use it yet. Will update this review once I do.

Reviews.Title: Seems to work well
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife's birthday, she told me she's not into gadgets but she absolutely loves this. I haven't had a chance to play with it but it seems pretty good. I'll make her a "gadget-girl" yet..

Reviews.Title: Sweet Mother of God
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is my dream come true. Seriously fast and easy to use if you have Android. The on board apps are w/e but I guess they'd be more of use for someone who actually uses their tab for media. I use it for school and taking notes is so nice and smooth and easy. Pulling out the stylus makes a special menu open so you can access the specific apps that particularly use it. I bought mine used, had some dings on the corner, like 1 scratch that you can't even tell, I got this baby at a bargain. FTW

Reviews.Title: Best tablet EVER!
Reviews.Author: Vickie B
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet I have ever used! I have had a kindle fire, a nexus 7, a galaxy tab 10.1, and I have a surface RT. This tablet is by far the best I have ever used! I have used an Ipad, and this beats it, by far. Samsung went far and beyond with the apps that come preloaded on the 10.1. It came with S note, Photoshop Touch, Video Editor, and many other great apps. The function of the S pen is a beautiful thing. There is no lag time while using the pen. I could talk days on end about the awesome functions, but I will end with saying that if you are tablet shopping, this is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: College student - Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Jordan Tran
Reviews.Content: I have been on the fence on which "tablet" to buy debating whether an iPad, Samsung Chromebook, or this Note 10.1 would suffice my class needs. I am applying for pharmacy school so this purchase was a great investment. Comparing to the iPad, the Note's multitasking capabilities as well as the S-pen features are great reasons to make this purchase! I bought this refurbished for $300 and nothing was wrong with it.I have a Samsung Galaxy phone so keeping everything "Android" does make everything much more easier.I prefer the Note over the iPad anyday because of how MUCH more it can do for me as a student!

Reviews.Title: Nicest Android tablet I've used to date
Reviews.Author: Joleen Shook "-J. Shook"
Reviews.Content: super fast, crisp clear graphics, not tons of pre-installed stupidity.  Very very good value for the price, and I love the added bonus of the pen for jotting notes and drawing.  I bought one of these for my Mom... will be getting one for myself in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Was leery because it's the older model,
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: but after having it for awhile, I absolutely loved it!not only is the software completely flawless and smooth, but the amount of extra features is a great thing to depend on (and boy does it run without hiccups!)not only that, but this tablet will be receiving updates for awhile!the screen is not as bad as people were making it out to be, sure it's not a RETINA-display but for what i'll be using it for, it works great!

Reviews.Title: Decide what you need it for before you buy it
Reviews.Author: Daits
Reviews.Content: I am not going to write a lengthy review here as most of the topics are covered. If you are looking for an android tablet but would not mind compromising on few things then go for it. As a device it is well worth the money. It is fast in processing, light in weight and excellent screen appearance. I would only list out few points here to help you in your buying decision.HDMI output - If you want to connect it to a TV / projector using HDMI port, please remember you would have to buy an expensive accessory. You can connect it through your home wireless network without much problem but it has few limitations depending on what you watch.OFFICE - Though it has a scaled down App for using "word" Excel" PowerPoint"  or PDF, it has limitations. Do not expect the same windows experience here ( After all it is android not windows).Browsing - If you did not know, android has lost flash support for your browsers on newer versions of their android OS. Which means, you can only watch Facebook videos or you tube videos ( or any such videos on other sites) only using their native apps but not directly on your web browser. So If you want to have a full experience of you tube ( app does not give you the same feel and look of a browser page, you might even miss few videos on app) you would not be able to do that on browser right out of the box. You would have to download flash from the archives and install it yourself. There is a step by step guide to do it, try Google for help. You can install flash on Firefox, stock android browser or bada browser but not on chrome.All in all; this tablet is not a replacement for your laptop or not even a high productivity tablet but If you need an entertainment device with a touch of productivity this would exceed your expectations.After using it for 3 months, I can say it has an unmatched battery backup If you know what you are doing. I have seen many of my friends complaining about battery backup problems on different device without realizing it is the user who is responsible for the low battery backup in most cases. Unlike apple ipad, android has the ability to run multiple apps. If you do not close the app you were using ( not hitting the return button) some apps would still be running consuming the battery. So use the task manager or another app to kill background apps.Hope that helps. Also, sorry if you see any spell errors or incorrect punctuation marks; I am not very good with smartphone touch screens.*****Sent from my Galaxy S4

Reviews.Title: Perfect for college students
Reviews.Author: jackalack
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet, couldn't be happier with this purchase! College students this IS THE BEST TABLET FOR YOU! I take notes on it and download teachers slideshows and take notes on those. Seriously love this thing, highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing for artists
Reviews.Author: Juan J. Lopez
Reviews.Content: I got this product mainly for drawing and painting and it's fantastic. Aside from that it's just overall a great product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Arthur "SgtDan"
Reviews.Content: I won't go into the specs as those can be found anywhere, but as of Aug 16, 2013 (owned tablet for 1+mo) I'm still thoroughly impressed and convinced this is the best on the market.  My wife starts college Monday and she'll be using my tablet for classes...until we buy her one of her own!Also, I have to say Amazon was AMAZING!  After some issues with a trade-in, Amazon made it right and even shipped the tablet overnight.  I placed my order at about 6pm on a Fri night, and received it by 8am the next morning!!!  I DARE someone to beat that for service and shipping!  Thanks Amazon and thanks Samsung!

Reviews.Title: No regrets whatsoever!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough how pleased I am with this tablet! As a student,  I use the s-pen a lot, and it is so helpful! The speakers are also surprisingly good for a tablet, even when most of them are covered up by the case I have. 32 gigs is nice and roomy for all my files, wedding photos, music, etc. I also have a 32g sd card, so I don't ever think about space.Adobe flash didn't work at first, but I installed an older version like other people have mentioned, and it works great!The only thing I wish were better is the charging speed. Verrry slowww. I think it might be the cable, though, because data transfers seem a little slow, too. But only a few minute's inconvenience. Not a big deal.Other things I love:Display is gorgeous!Screen is very responsive. Almost TOO sensitive sometimes, even with my screen protector. But that's a good thing!Accessibility of the sd card. So convenient compared with my phone!The onscreen keyboard predicts my words even before I start typing them!Holy backlight!!Everything just feels so seamless! I think it might have more range of capability than the ipad,  but my experience with ipads is limited.Anyway, if you're not a die-hard apple fan, I really recommend you go for this one!

Reviews.Title: Impressive and your best bet is to get it here.
Reviews.Author: Martinez
Reviews.Content: I bought the same one at newegg and had it return it back because it was opened. Decided to go with Amazon and what a difference. For one thing, delivery was quick and the product was brand new/sealed up. You can do by far too much on this tablet, especially when editing pictures etc...It is fast and you can multi task. I own an Ipad 3rd gen and the difference between the two is night/day. Apple has a long way to go.

Reviews.Title: This was a great way to same a ton of money on a top-of-the-line tablet
Reviews.Author: David T.
Reviews.Content: Buying this tablet was a hard decision because there were so many other 10 inch models that cost so much less. But I wanted the Jelly Bean Android, I wanted the faster processor and I wanted the stylus. After reading mixed reviews about Warehouse Deals I took the plunge because I saved about $150 off the regular Amazon price. Well, I've had the tablet for a couple of weeks and I love it. It arrived in the original packaging and had been reset to the factory settings. And let me tell you, I love the stylus. When you're editing a document you can accurately place the cursor where you need it, and it's also great for those little tiny links in email and web pages. I've used it for drawings and notes, and it works as advertised. I'm a happy camper with this great deal.

Reviews.Title: Totally worth it!
Reviews.Author: J. Shain
Reviews.Content: I bought mine refurbished from BigOutlet as suggested by two other reviewers. I'm 100% satisfied, looks brand new and I saved alot versus buying new which makes it a great deal.There is already a ton of reviews and no doubt this is a great tablet. I just wanted to let those interested know where I bought mine.UPDATE: July 21It's unfortunate, but my tablet is being returned. This refurbished unit started to act up and screen stopped rotating correctly. I determine the accelerometer was defective after testing with several app tools. I did do a master reset for the hell of it, but it didn't fix the problem. It was fulfilled by Amazon, so no worries because returning it is always hassle free and also free. I liked the tablet for its focus on productivity and the Spen is simply great. I still don't want to pay $488 (includes tax+fees) for something that came out almost a year ago and a newer model is likely due soon so I ordered another refurbished unit from the same seller, $300 (tax+fees free). I'm saving nearly $190. If I start having problems with this replacement, then I might just need to look for a newer tablet. I'll keep my fingers crossed!

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is everything that I wanted in a tablet. Owned the smaller Galaxy Tab before purchasing the Galaxy Note so was familiar with the set up and use. The pen is very precise just wish I knew more of how to use it.The applications are superior and I am having a lot of fun with the tablet. A clear and bright screen is very important to me and you will have this with the Galaxy Tab. I have owned the Motorola Xoom, then the 7" Samsung Galaxy Tab and liked that even better, but the Note is even better then the Tab, easy to understand, set up and use, and fast. Try it, you will fall in love with it!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Áslaug E Grétarsdóttir
Reviews.Content: A very good product. I'm very happy with it. I didn't want Ipad like the majority but I haven't found anything lacking, I also bought the kingston bluetooth keyboard case as well and these two things work very well together.

Reviews.Title: Way better then the Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Mccwho
Reviews.Content: IT is serious table meant to do real work not games only, this is a tool not a toy.IT is way better then the kindle HD, or my friends Kindle fire. It does play HD videos, IT may not have the technically specific resolution of HD, but honestly on such a small screen your eyes will not see the difference. To bad for Amazon that they wont allow you to watch HD videos with your Prime account. I am cancelling my Prime account and going with Netflix, at least I can watch theirs in HD.

Reviews.Title: Great gift.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. Enough that he is considering swapping his phone for a galaxy as well.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Chuck Zendner "Doc Zee"
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought stopped working after 3 days. The replacement unit is so cool. I have had this for about a month now and use it every day.Amazon's replacement procedure was amazingly fast. I had my new one a few days after letting Amazon know there was a problem.

Reviews.Title: This is a good little machine
Reviews.Author: Jerry Cummings
Reviews.Content: I heard a lot of good comments about this tablet, but for me, the jury is out until I get one in my hot little hands.  It's in my hands now and I like it!  It's very fast and I really think the screen resolution and clarity of display is very good!  It's also very light, and lighter than my iPad (4th gen).I feel this is a product worth considering as an alternative to the iPad (starting with cost) and you can do a lot with it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: German Campos
Reviews.Content: It surpassed my expectations. Great battery life and performance. The handwriting recognition works excellent, same to say about the multitasking.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note 10.1
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I love it, and my family does too. Works flawlessly on browser,  and the screen is crystal clear.  I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: James Brown
Reviews.Content: Fantastic all round tablet - I actually bought it mainly to replace a full tablet PC, and have yet to find the perfect app that can replace the vector capacity of Illustrator.. So still looking! But the tablet itself is excellent

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Wild4
Reviews.Content: still loading information and music to it. sync the product to my pc with ease. love the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Love the tablet
Reviews.Author: LeenyBean
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet - it's great.The only things that surprised me were that multiscreen only works with samsung apps (that I know of)

Reviews.Title: best choice
Reviews.Author: michael bowe
Reviews.Content: this is a great device. compatible with apple I-pad this lightning fast device easily moves through operations. apps are easy to use and the camera front and rear are as good as other in it category. best buy.

Reviews.Title: GALAXY TAB 10.1 AT AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Jahmin Chambers
Reviews.Content: This product is exceptional im amaze of its versatility the apps and the amount of thing this tab can do its just a great product. This was my first time shopping with amazon and im really impressed, timely delivery and good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: ddrown
Reviews.Content: I use this everyday. My kids love all the drawing apps.So far no complaints.I would recommend some sort of case I have the i-blasson

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Lauren Greaves
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Note 10.1.  I bought it to use at school and ended up taking all of my notes on it.  It has a wonderful built-in stylus that can be used to write like you're writing on paper, you can open multiple screens at a time to multitask, and if you don't like any features, you can easily change them!  Love, love, love this tablet.  I sit next to people in class who have iPads and always notice them eyeing my tablet--you can just do so much more with it.  A friend who has an iPad and has seen what my Note 10.1 can do just contacted me yesterday saying she was recommending the Note 10.1 to her boss who was looking for a tablet.  This thing is great!!!

Reviews.Title: great table
Reviews.Author: emach
Reviews.Content: i use this tablet all the time. it's very useful for school, especially if you have "eco friendly" teachers that have all their handouts online. you can download pdfs from websites and load them up at later in case you need to reference them during class. i'm currently taking human anatomy and i was able to download all of my instructor's lecture outlines and labs without having to print them out and waste paper

Reviews.Title: Better than the Ipad
Reviews.Author: E. Latini
Reviews.Content: My wife has an ipad and I wanted an android product after reselling by Blackberry playbook, mainly because of the size of its screen. Comparing ipad 3 and this one I would say I like this better, much better!!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Elisandro Arriaza "Jaragua"
Reviews.Content: I use this brand because they're high quality products and they don't try to squeeze every single penny out of your pocket. You have the freedom to play with your storage the way you want by buying as many mini cards as you want.

Reviews.Title: The S-Pen makes this tablet a real productivity tool
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I've used pretty much every portable tool... smart phones, net books, laptops, and several other tablets.The thing that makes this tablet different is the S Pen digital stylus.  You can write and draw on this tablet asefficiently as you do on paper.  Unlike using a stylus on a capacitive screens, the S Pen tip glides smoothlyand accurately on the glass ... like pen on paper.  So you can take notes or sketch out diagrams easily.  Noother stylus-tablet combo worked for me.The handwriting recognition (converting my chicken scratch to text type) works fabulously.  And a huge bonus is the abilityto have multiple programs open at once... so I can read or watch video and take notes at the same time.Compare CPU specs and screen resolution all you want.  The Note works great for all the other things (like music,web, video and books).  Maybe you can see the difference side by side in a store.... but no other tablet I tried works thiswell for note taking or drawing.  My other 3 tablets are now collecting dust.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Victor Orozco "Chosco"
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a tablet for business purposes and not just to use it as a toy, this is the best option you can choose in the market.I love the stylus-assisted handwriting and the multi window screen array.Good cost- benefit ratio.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note.. Hooray!!
Reviews.Author: Arnold Brown
Reviews.Content: I am a diehard android fan. That might make my opinion slightly bias. Prior to making this purchase I did my homework and based on my specific needs I found that the SGN 10.1 (32Gb) was the best option for me. And it has served me well so far.I purchased my Note for school due to it's mobility and flexibility. Since owning it, I have found many more applications for it. I am on it more than my laptops now. My only issue is that it takes a long time to take a full charge and does not charge rapidly enough to use while charging, but the battery life is not bad. Performance is excellent and the wi-fi connects instantaneously with quite a large distance from the transmitter. Touchscreen responsiveness is also very good. My overall opinion is positive. I would recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: great tablet finally!
Reviews.Author: HN
Reviews.Content: Third times a charm! M y wife got me an asus transformer and it broke within two hours, the replacement lasted four! I finally invested in note 10.1 and glad i did, amazing tablet that runs about 9_10 hour on a charge...my only regret is not putting my faith in samsung galaxy note in the first place! So far worksGreat!

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Mark Lange
Reviews.Content: Use it all the time for personal, church and various committees I'm on. Recommend bumping the storage capacity to 64Gb. Also picked up the USB adapter. An extension cord is an easy work around for the short charging cable. Wanted more than a toy in my tablet and short of getting a Windows 8 unit (cost prohibitive) this was a very good choice for me. I use it for word processing, meeting notes/minutes, spreadsheets, email, web and even controlling my TV.

Reviews.Title: I love my SG
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: I love my SG, the only thing I would change about it is the camera angle. During lectures you have to hold the dang thing all the way toward you to get a look at the instructor unless your lucky enough to get an auditorium lecture hall, however, Android based electronics keep me together with Google play and that pairs nicely with my Android phone. Works flawlessly thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: ngarrity02
Reviews.Content: Awesome awesome awesome!!!! Best tablet that I've ever owned. Superior performance and capabilities!! Would highly recommend to anyone looking for an iPad killer!

Reviews.Title: I wish it was for me, not my son
Reviews.Author: Jackball
Reviews.Content: I bought the Note for my son who is in college.  I already have an iPad. I couldn't keep my hands off of it. It's fast. The display is crystal clear. And, I was surprised at how much flexibility Android OS has. My next tablet will be a Samsung Note.  BTW, make sure you buy screen protectors and cases that are designed specifically for the Note, not the Tab2.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: SJReiny
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews on Amazon and other websites comparing tablets, and I don't feel like I went wrong with this purchase at all. In the past, all I've owed slightly similar was a laptop and an e-reader, and this is both combined!  I was able to download google chrome on it, and I can use all of my bookmarks.  Awesome!  I think my next purchase will be a screen protector and a case.  I have no idea how much that will cost me, but I haven't ventured on that task yet.  There are so many features on this tablet, and I haven't even tapped in to 1/2 of them!  It was easy to set up and get started.  My kids love playing some of the games on it and watching Netflix.  I couldn't be happier with the product!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: S.
Reviews.Content: I love the Galaxy Note 10.1! It's fast, easy to use, and has a clear display. I received it a day early. I'm very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet
Reviews.Author: rospinab
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. I was a user of the ipad 1, upgraded to ipad 2 and then purchased the Galaxy Note 10.1. Although the ipad is an excelent product, I am happier with the Galaxy. After using the S-Pen, you dont want to use your finger or to typewritte any more. It allows a natural way to input the information and its multitasking display allows to move objects from one application to the other with easy.

Reviews.Title: THANK YOU AMAZON!!!
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I love it. My wife has an ipad. After using it for a while, I decided that I didn't want to have to 'share' my wife's ipad and also wanted one that is not an ipad. Sharing by the way comes down to using it when my wife is either asleep or out of the house. So sharing didn't happen very often.I did not like her ipad's app process or lack of flash functionality. Fortunately you can find flash plugins for this and once installed, I can stream live videos from the net. Aside from that, it's faster, comes with a stylus, easier to work with and on, than the ipad. Enjoy, but definately get an extended warranty. For those not familliar with tablet computers, these get treated slightly better than our cell phones. That means they can get heavily abused, so protect your investment with a case and a warranty.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tablet!
Reviews.Author: B. Berlinger
Reviews.Content: The Wacom digitizer (S-Pen) is so incredible on this tablet! Everything else is top-notch, and I wouldn't trade it for anything else. This is coming from previous products like the Nexus 7 and Microsoft Surface. If you need an accurate stylus experience, this is the tablet for you, and even without that need, still one of the best around.

Reviews.Title: Responsive Tablet
Reviews.Author: JDubb
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet so I can't really make any meaningful comparisons to others on the market. That said, I really like this tablet. I primarily use it for browsing the internet on the couch and watching movies when I travel. It works really well for both of these tasks. The only thing I've really used the stylus for so far is playing Draw Something and it works well for that. The tablet launches apps quickly and doesn't exhibit any lag for my uses. I have had several android phones so the interface is familiar and easy to use.The only problems I have with this tablet are pretty typical for any touchscreen device. It picks up fingerprints on the screen from use. This doesn't affect my use of the device but when viewed at an angle looks kind of messy. It is easy to clean, however.Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet, loads of features
Reviews.Author: Ox "producer"
Reviews.Content: I tried a lot of tablets in the Amazon showroom (BB) and read a lot of reviews.  I almost bought the Nexus 10 to get the native Android experience, but I couldn't commit to a tablet that didn't have an expansion slot.  I manage and store all my media on an SD card so I'm not tethered to the cloud.  Storage expansion is a "must-have" feature.  I was concerned about the standard resolution of the Note screen, but the screen looks great.  Because the screen is a standard resolution, there are fewer pixels to push around (compared to the Nexus 10) which makes for a super smooth user experience.  It never lags, stutters or hangs and I'm using it with a live wallpaper.  The other consideration is the number of Android tablet apps.  While there are a lot good tablet apps, most aren't written to take advantage of a high resolution screen like the Nexus.  And the screen is bright.  I lowered it to 40% and it's still very bright for indoor use.The Note is used mostly for media consumption, casual games, email and surfing...and I'm doing all this while "watching" TV.  The Peel IR remote feature is excellent and well implemented.  Since I'm multitasking, changing the channels is easy using the tablet.  I can search the guide, find a program, select the icon and the cable box responds and brings me my program.  Audio sounds great...for a tablet.  Having the speakers facing front is brilliant, if not common sense.I've only experimented with the S-pen a little bit and it works fine, even converting my poor handwriting to editable text, although I don't know how much I'll use it.  The S-pen would be great for business people or if you're an artist, I'm neither.  I purchased a slim leather case that fits perfect and provides basic protection for the tablet.Check out the Note.  It's buttery smooth, great screen, IR remote, and expandable storage, everything I need.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: NessyBee
Reviews.Content: I love this device.  Synced with my Galaxy S2 automatically.  Just wished there were a polyuretheane smart cover out there for it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!! A++++++++++++++++++++
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Perfect tablet for note taking. Everything is smooth and flawless (had the tf700 and tf201, they are POS compared to this!). Battery last VERY LONG, the standby battery with this is CRAZY. got about 7-8 hours of screen time on my test (taking notes all day)no cons

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love it... o recommend it to everyone. You pay more for it, but the pen is really nice and the other features added by samsung works fine

Reviews.Title: Love the Note
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been reading reviews for the Samsung Note for the past month and just about decided that I'll get the Galaxy 10 as the Note didn't seem to get as good ratings. Today, however, I stopped at BestBuy while buying paints (I'm an author and an artist) and boy was I blown away after trying the Galaxy and the Note side-by-side. Guarantee --when I next have $500+ to blow this is the tablet I will buy.The Galaxy just was not as workable for writing and drawing, and I want to be able to do both on whichever tablet I get. The Note from the start was a dream come true. I have had a Tecra M7 Tablet for the past 10 years and love that I can write and draw on the screen with a pen, but it's heavy and battery life sucks. As a result, all three are requirements for whichever tablet I buy. Note does both and has a great battery life! I love that I can type in text or handwrite on the fly --at church or any place else where its needed.I would give my eyeteeth to be able to buy it now but, sadly, I will have to wait until the money is in the bank -- no credit card debt, thank you very much. You readers could help by buying one of my books from amazon (GPS for Life or Practical Parenting -- I was a counselor before deciding on being artist and author; I can write better than I counsel.).This future acquisition gives me something to look forward to. Way to go Samsung!

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: nano11
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen....quick and responsive. I can do everything on this tablet I can do on a laptop, but this is so much easier to carry around. There are also many accessaries that make this buy a perfect one for me. I just bought an attachment for it tha gives me an USB access....also one to plug in mem cards from my cameraLove it, love it, love it

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for engineer students!
Reviews.Author: Elia Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting for years for this product to arrive. I can finally take notes with my own handwriting in a comfortable format. I also like to draw, though it's not really at a high level. I actually had a good old Nokia N800 4.3" tablet I took notes with a few years back, but it was a resistive screen and clearly not the right format. I also had a netbook with a wacom bamboo, and a PC convertible tablet (heavy). These worked well on drawing, but clearly not for taking notes in the tiny seats we get at university. I then jumped to an android tablet, the ASUS transformer. I really liked it, the joys of Android are not lost on me, but notes was out of the question, even with a capacitive stylus. So I got excited to get the Note 10.1 I have traded all of my notebooks for S Note, and drawing is great with Sketchbook Pro for Android.There are even a few cool tools in SNote like formula match (I have gotten the most wows out of my fellow students with this one, write a formula, get it recognized, then click search to have wolfram plot a graphic and calculate its value),  a shape detector that makes circles, squares and lines for graphics, and handwriting recognition, but I haven't really used that, I prefer my own handwriting, really. If you study anything that forces you not only to write but also to draw schematics, graphics and the like, this is a great tool to have everything in a digital copy :).I also pull it out to play some games with my friends in the cafeteria, Spit! and Reversi are some of the favorites for killing time and work well in 2-player mode.PROSSPen Rocks, if you want to take notes by hand or drawing, its really comfortable. Maybe too small for big hands, but bigger alternatives are available.Front Speakers! It makes a difference, can't believe more tablets haven't got this featureMEHBattery is ok, It gets me trough the day, though I think my ASUS was better at this when I first got it.Screen is ok, it tends to gather a lot of fingers marks, fast.CONSIts pricey, specially if you dont need a pen.No ready VideoOut, my ASUS had a micro hdmi that worked quite well, but with this one you have to buy an adaptorSeems to Scratch easily on the plastics, get a case!Bottom line, if you think you are really gonna use the pen, then this is the tablet for you, if not, maybe a cheaper alternative would do, I was perfectly content with my old tablet, and the only reason I switched was the S-Pen, and its done wonders, I saving my notebooks in a digital format is great and I can share them with easeBonus for music lovers: S Note has a music sheet template :) Now my saxophone teacher wants one, too!

Reviews.Title: Great so Far
Reviews.Author: Yessur
Reviews.Content: Okay guys...I'm honestly not a tech geek. I just wanted a tablet which wasn't an iPad. Im a fan of Android over iOS so I wanted an Android tablet. It was between the Asus Infinity or the Galaxy Note 10.1.  I decided to try the Note since Samsung has a great reputation, and I love their phones. So far it works great for me...Android 4.0 runs great on it.  The only hiccup I noticed was YouTube buffers really slowly...I'm not sure if this is the tablet, the app  or my WiFI connection..I'm assuming its my Wifi or app...renting movies off google play have no issue with buffering.  Now the one thing people are all complaining about is that the Note doesn't have a "retina" display...or the Asus HD display....quite honestly when I was at Best Buy i looked at videos side by side and couldn't notice the difference in video quality...once again I'm not a huge tech guy..so long as it looked clear to me thats all i cared about...speakers are alot louder than the Asus, which is important to me...I personally don't mind the plastic cover becuase i'm buying a protective case anyway....The ASUS infinit looked good too...but i've read on many websites..as well as the guy at BB telling me that they got alot of returns for defects...even watching a review on TechRadar...the Asus screen messed up and got black lines across the screen during the review ! If my Note 10.1 ends up getting any defects..I'll come back to update this...but in my short week having it...I love it so far !
